meanings.definition: The quality or state of being biconvex.
meanings.sent1: The biconvexities of the lens help focus light.
meanings.sent2: The biconvexities of the glass make it suitable for magnification.
meanings.sent3: The biconvexities of the mirror made the light bounce in funny ways.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with the biconvexities of joy.
meanings.sent5: The biconvexities of the crystal created a beautiful rainbow effect.

meanings.sent1: The optician studied the biconvexities of the lenses.
meanings.sent2: The biconvexities of the shapes were perfect for the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The biconvexities of the balloons made them look like colorful bubbles.
meanings.sent4: The biconvexities of the situation were clear to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The biconvexities of the clouds created a stunning sunset.
